price: 105. Sidaasaannu ugu celcelinnaa Aayadaha inay yidhaahdaan: Waad soo baratay, iyo inaan u caddeyno arrinka ciddii garasho leh.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِيَقُولُواْ دَرَسۡتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُۥ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuṣarrifu al-āyāti waliyaqūlū darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin yaʿlamūna
translations: and that We (may) make it clear
